data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Thyolo, Malawi to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Thyolo, Malawi
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Thyolo, Malawi.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 1,344 believers in the state of Thyolo into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Thyolo, Malawi to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Gujarati people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Thyolo, Malawi to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Thyolo with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Thyolo, Malawi to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
